text:
It's amazing how much
we've all learned and grown,

but I definitely
did not expect it
to be this big for me

and for the cast
and for the channel.

Hey! I'm Cameron,
and I play Luke.

Cam to me is, like,
he's an actor's--

he's, like,
a director's actor.

I think Cameron,
of the four of us,
just has the most swag ever.
Like, none of us put together

could ever have the amount of
swag that Cameron has.

- You love us. Yeah.
- Yes, we do.
( music playing )

- ( cheering )
- Say hi to the camera!
All: Hi!

( grunts )
Oh, my gosh!
I'm sorry.
( imitating beats )
( applause )

Man: Thank you guys all
for your incredible work.
( music continues )

There is no treasure map
on the back

of the Declaration
of Independence.
Or so you say.
I made her laugh!

And to think
you could've had this.

- Yeah!
- ( laughter )
